time_inperson.title: Approximate time (hours/week) caregiver spends with patient IN PERSON

residencedt.title: If not private residence, date entered.

cinfo.title: 1. May the investigators use the information from your evaluations and treatment, without identifying you, to learn about brain disease?

csampblood.title: 2. May the investigators obtain a blood sample?

csampswab.title: If you are not willing to let the investigators obtain a blood sample, may they obtain cells by a cheek swab?

csamppunct.title: 3. May the investigators perform a lumbar puncture to obtain a CSF sample?

cdonatebr.title: 4. Are you willing to donate your brain at the time of death for research?

csampbrain.title: 5. May the investigators keep your samples for future research to learn about brain diseases?

csampbrainshare.title: May the investigators share your samples/clinical info with other researchers to learn about brain diseases?

cfcellline.title: 7b. Do you agree for part of your blood/tissue sample to be used to grow a long-term cell line?

clindem.title: 1. Did the subject meet clinical criteria for dementia (e.g., DSM IV or other) at the most recent evaluation for dementia?

notdem.title:
Not demented
If subject did not meet criteria for dementia, what was the diagnosis?
enum: 1, 1 Not demented control subject, no neurological disorder
2 Not demented, but has other neurological disorder (Parkinson's, MS, etc.)
3 Questionable dementia (e.g., CDR 0.5) or cognitive impairment (MCI, AAMI)

alzdem.title:
Demented 
If subject met criteria for dementia, what was the primary diagnosis?
alzdem.description:
Alzheimer's Dementia types:
PR - Probable Alzheimer's disease (e.g. NINCDS 'probable Alzheimer's disease' or DSM IV 'dementia of the Alzheimer's type')
PO - Alzheimer's disease with other conditions or variations in course (e.g. NINCDS 'possible Alzheimer's disease', DSM IV multiple etiologies where Alzheimer's is the predominate cause)

mixed.title: Mixed AD/LDB
mixed.description: If PR or PO checked for Alzheimer's Dementias, does subject also meet clinicalcriteria for dementia with Lewy bodies, Lewy body variant Alzheimer's disease, or diffuse Lewy body disease? (AL)

nonaddem.title: Non-Alzheimer's Dementia types  Primary cause of dementia is not Alzheimer's
enum: 7 Communicating, obstructive, or normal pressure hydrocephalus
8 Vascular dementia (e.g. dementia due to stroke)
9 Dementia with Lewy Bodies (not Parkinson's dementia) (DL)
16 Dementia due to multiple non-Alzheimer's etiologies
17 Dementia due to other general medical conditions

psychos.title: Subject has signs and symptoms of psychosis

dep_a0_2.title: Subject had depression at the most recent evaluation

del_a0_2.title: Subject had delirium at the most recent evaluation

utswclinicdx.title: 2a. UTSW ADC  Clinician  Diagnosis Codes(Make sure to code presence of depression, delirium, or Parkinsonism)

clin_dx1.title: Primary Diagnosis
enum: AF AD pathology, insufficient for AD diagnosis
CO MCI - Mild Cognitive Impairment - Other
FV Frontotemporal Dementia - Right Temporal Variant
LA Lobar Atrophy, w/o Pick bodies
LG Lewy body pathology, amygdala &/or olfactory bulb only
LO Lewy body pathology, NOS [not otherwise specified]
LT Lewy body pathology, brainstem predominant
ML Mitochondrial Encephalopathy with Lactic Acidosis
NI Neuronal intermediate filament inclusion disease (NIFID)
OL Possible Dementia with Lewy Bodies
TF Familial Multiple System Tauopathy with Dementia
TS Sporadic Multiple System Tauopathy with Dementia

TS Sporadic Multiple System Tauopathy with Dementia

eov_status.title: 3. Status at end of this visit
enum: 2 Active: further phone (or other) visits expected
3 Active: no further visits expected, autopsy expected or have autopsy consent
4 Inactive: no further data expected, no autopsy expected
